job_tasks.phrase: Understand specifications in collaboration with the PO and other stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates collaboration with a Product Owner and stakeholders to understand requirements, which is a core aspect of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborating with other teams organized within an Agile Release Train
job_tasks.justification: Working within an Agile Release Train implies understanding project structures and collaborating across different teams to achieve business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: influencing stakeholders to implement software architecture improvements and adopt new development methodologies
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to influence and align stakeholders with technical directions to achieve business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing, building, and managing highly secure, scalable, and available architectures
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core activities of designing and building software systems with an emphasis on non-functional requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop tools to deploy environments
job_tasks.justification: Developing tools for deployment falls under the broader umbrella of software development to support operational processes.

job_tasks.phrase: Contributing to technical design documentation
job_tasks.justification: Creating documentation for technical designs is a standard software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Troubleshoot and analyze complex problems in distributed systems
job_tasks.justification: Troubleshooting complex issues in systems is a fundamental software development and engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: contribute to continuous improvement of our software development WoW
job_tasks.justification: Improving the 'way of working' for software development is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: developing cloud-based solutions
job_tasks.justification: The core responsibility is creating solutions on the cloud, which is a form of software development.

job_tasks.though: The description also has elements of MLOps and infrastructure, but the core focus is on developing solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: writing and maintain high-quality, reusable code and manage configurations through scripting languages
job_tasks.justification: Writing and maintaining code is a primary software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide technical direction for DevOps initiatives
job_tasks.justification: Giving direction for DevOps initiatives involves guiding software development and operations practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve continuous integration and delivery systems
job_tasks.justification: CI/CD is a core component of MLOps and operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Deploy, maintain and uphold DevOps architecture standards and services.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the deployment and maintenance of DevOps infrastructure and standards.

job_tasks.phrase: Support developers teams in DevOps process
job_tasks.justification: Assisting development teams with DevOps processes falls under operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring cloud management and data storage services
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring cloud services and data storage is an operational task related to infrastructure management.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead the implementation and management of Azure cloud services with a focus on Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
job_tasks.justification: Managing cloud services with IaC is a key aspect of MLOps and cloud operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines using tools such as Azure DevOps, GitHub or GitLab
job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining CI/CD pipelines is a fundamental MLOps task.

job_tasks.phrase: Configure, monitor and maintain cost-effective, scalable and resilient Microsoft Azure solutions
job_tasks.justification: This involves the operational aspects of configuring, monitoring, and maintaining cloud solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure compliance with client security, quality, scalability, resiliency and regulatory standards
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring compliance with various standards is an operational responsibility for maintaining systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Create clear, comprehensive technical support documentation, reusable assets and guidance materials
job_tasks.justification: Creating support documentation and guidance materials is part of operationalizing and maintaining systems.

soft_skills.phrase: collaboration with the PO and other stakeholders
Demonstrate a proactive mindset and a strong desire to learn and explore new technologies, including GenAI, LLM and Copilots
Troubleshoot and analyze complex problems in distributed systems
take initiative and demonstrate a results-oriented approach

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes cloud infrastructure, DevOps, CI/CD, and general software engineering. While it mentions an interest in GenAI, LLMs, and Copilots, there are no core responsibilities or projects directly involving building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative AI models themselves. The focus is on leveraging these technologies as tools within a broader infrastructure and development context, rather than specializing in Generative AI engineering.
